name: ...You.
description:
A very simple game and easy to play game. All you have to do is go right.

Made in: RPG Maker VX Ace

Created in four days total.

-----------

LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS to move

"A" KEY to jump

UP & LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEY to climb hills.

-----------

Developed by:

WildyLeon

Credit to Khas Archtunder, Victor Sant, and Yanfly for code.

Credit to RelaxingTube and SoundBible for audio.
